storyTitle: As Scheduler, I want to modify employee schedules to achieve flexible shift management

testCases.title: Validate successful modification of employee schedule
preconditions: User is logged in with Scheduler role
At least one employee with an existing schedule is available in the system
Employee has valid contact information for notifications
System notification service is operational

steps.action: Navigate to employee schedule modification page by selecting an employee from the schedule list
steps.expectedResult: Schedule modification page loads successfully and displays current schedule details including shift times, dates, and employee information

steps.action: Change shift start time from current value to a new valid time and change shift end time accordingly
steps.expectedResult: Modified shift times are displayed in the input fields without errors

steps.action: Click the Submit or Save button to save the schedule changes
steps.expectedResult: System validates the changes for conflicts, displays success message, and saves the modified schedule to the database

steps.action: Verify notification sent to employee by checking the notification logs or employee's notification inbox
steps.expectedResult: Employee receives schedule change notification via configured channels (email/in-app) with updated shift details

postconditions: Employee schedule is updated with new shift times in the database
Notification is successfully delivered to the employee
Schedule modification is logged in audit trail
No scheduling conflicts exist

testCases.title: Verify shift swap request and approval workflow
preconditions: Two employees (Employee A and Employee B) are logged into the system
Both employees have assigned shifts that are eligible for swapping
Scheduler user has approval permissions for shift swaps
Notification system is configured and operational

steps.action: Employee A navigates to their schedule and initiates a shift swap request by selecting their shift and choosing Employee B as the swap partner
steps.expectedResult: Swap request form is displayed with Employee A's shift details and Employee B as the selected swap partner

steps.action: Employee A submits the shift swap request
steps.expectedResult: Swap request is created with 'Pending Approval' status and appears in the Scheduler's approval queue

steps.action: Scheduler logs in and navigates to the shift swap approval section
steps.expectedResult: Pending swap request from Employee A is visible with all relevant details (employees involved, shift details, request date)

steps.action: Scheduler reviews the swap request details and clicks the Approve button
steps.expectedResult: System validates the swap for conflicts, executes the swap, and updates both Employee A's and Employee B's schedules accordingly

steps.action: Verify notifications sent to both employees by checking notification logs
steps.expectedResult: Both Employee A and Employee B receive confirmation notifications of the approved shift swap with updated schedule details

postconditions: Shift swap is completed and both employee schedules are updated
Swap request status is changed to 'Approved'
Both employees have received swap confirmation notifications
Audit log contains complete record of the swap transaction

testCases.title: Validate audit logging of schedule modifications
preconditions: User is logged in with Scheduler role
Audit logging system is enabled and operational
At least one employee schedule exists in the system
User has permissions to access audit logs

steps.action: Navigate to employee schedule modification page and select an employee schedule
steps.expectedResult: Schedule details are displayed for modification

steps.action: Modify the employee schedule by changing shift date or time and submit the changes
steps.expectedResult: Modification is validated, saved successfully, and confirmation message is displayed

steps.action: Navigate to the audit logs section and filter logs for the specific employee schedule that was modified
steps.expectedResult: Audit log entry is displayed showing the modification details including: timestamp, user who made the change, original values, new values, and action type

steps.action: Verify audit log integrity by checking that all required fields are populated and the timestamp matches the modification time
steps.expectedResult: Audit logs are complete with all required information, unaltered, and accurately reflect the schedule modification that was performed

postconditions: Schedule modification is permanently recorded in audit logs
Audit log entry contains complete and accurate information
Audit log is immutable and cannot be modified
Audit trail maintains compliance requirements

storyTitle: As Scheduler, I want to receive notifications for schedule changes to stay informed

testCases.title: Validate notification sent on schedule creation
preconditions: User is logged in with Scheduler role
Employee exists in the system with valid email address
Notification service is operational and configured
Employee has default notification preferences enabled for schedule creation
System time is synchronized for accurate delivery time tracking

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule creation page and select an employee
steps.expectedResult: Schedule creation form is displayed with employee information populated

steps.action: Fill in all required schedule details including shift date, start time, end time, and any additional information
steps.expectedResult: All schedule fields are populated with valid data

steps.action: Click the Save or Create button to create the new employee schedule
steps.expectedResult: Schedule is validated, saved successfully to the database, and confirmation message is displayed

steps.action: Navigate to the notification delivery logs section and search for the notification event related to the newly created schedule
steps.expectedResult: Notification event is logged with status 'Sent', timestamp, recipient details, and delivery channels used

steps.action: Verify user receives notification via email by checking the employee's email inbox
steps.expectedResult: Employee receives email notification containing the new schedule details within 1 minute of schedule creation

steps.action: Verify user receives in-app notification by checking the employee's in-app notification center
steps.expectedResult: Employee receives in-app notification with new schedule details displayed in their notification inbox within 1 minute

postconditions: New schedule is created and saved in the system
Notification is delivered via both email and in-app channels
Notification delivery is logged with successful status
Notification delivery time is within 1 minute SLA

testCases.title: Verify user can configure notification preferences
preconditions: User is logged into the system (Scheduler or Employee role)
User profile exists with default notification settings
Notification preferences feature is enabled in the system
At least one notification channel option is available (email, in-app)

steps.action: Navigate to user profile settings by clicking on the user profile icon or menu
steps.expectedResult: User profile page loads successfully

steps.action: Locate and click on the notification preferences section or tab
steps.expectedResult: Notification preferences section is visible displaying current notification settings with options for email and in-app notifications

steps.action: Update notification channels by toggling email notifications off and keeping in-app notifications on
steps.expectedResult: Notification channel selections are updated in the UI reflecting the new choices

steps.action: Click the Save or Update button to save the notification preferences
steps.expectedResult: Preferences are saved successfully, confirmation message is displayed, and the page reflects the updated settings

steps.action: Trigger a notification event by creating or modifying a schedule that would normally send notifications to this user
steps.expectedResult: Schedule change is saved and notification event is triggered

steps.action: Verify notification is sent according to updated preferences by checking that in-app notification is received but email notification is not sent
steps.expectedResult: User receives in-app notification only, no email notification is sent, and notification logs confirm delivery according to user preferences

postconditions: User notification preferences are updated and saved in the database
Future notifications respect the updated preferences
Notification delivery follows the configured channels only
User preferences are persisted across sessions

storyTitle: As Scheduler, I want to validate schedule conflicts to achieve error-free scheduling

testCases.title: Validate detection of overlapping shifts
preconditions: User is logged in with Scheduler role
At least one employee exists in the system
User has permission to create and modify schedules
Schedule management interface is accessible

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule management page
steps.expectedResult: Schedule management page loads successfully with employee list and calendar view

steps.action: Select an employee from the employee list
steps.expectedResult: Employee is selected and highlighted in the interface

steps.action: Assign a shift to the selected employee for a specific time (e.g., Monday 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM)
steps.expectedResult: Shift assignment form accepts the input and displays the shift details

steps.action: Click 'Save' button to save the shift
steps.expectedResult: Shift is saved successfully, confirmation message is displayed, and shift appears on the schedule calendar

steps.action: Attempt to assign another overlapping shift to the same employee (e.g., Monday 3:00 PM - 11:00 PM)
steps.expectedResult: System detects the overlap and displays a conflict alert with details of the conflicting shifts

steps.action: Verify that the 'Save' button is disabled or clicking it does not save the conflicting schedule
steps.expectedResult: System blocks the save operation and prevents the conflicting schedule from being saved

steps.action: Resolve the conflict by adjusting the second shift time to non-overlapping hours (e.g., Monday 6:00 PM - 11:00 PM)
steps.expectedResult: Conflict alert disappears and shift details are updated in the form

steps.action: Click 'Save' button to save the adjusted shift
steps.expectedResult: System validates the schedule, finds no conflicts, and saves the shift successfully with confirmation message

postconditions: Two non-overlapping shifts are saved for the employee
No conflicting schedules exist in the system
Schedule calendar displays both shifts correctly

testCases.title: Verify conflict alert displays detailed information
preconditions: User is logged in with Scheduler role
At least one employee exists in the system with an existing shift assigned
Existing shift is scheduled (e.g., Tuesday 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM)
User has permission to modify schedules

steps.action: Navigate to the schedule management page
steps.expectedResult: Schedule management page loads with existing schedules visible

steps.action: Select the employee who already has a shift assigned for Tuesday 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM
steps.expectedResult: Employee is selected and their existing shift is visible on the calendar

steps.action: Attempt to assign an overlapping shift to the same employee (e.g., Tuesday 2:00 PM - 10:00 PM)
steps.expectedResult: System triggers conflict detection and displays a conflict alert modal or notification

steps.action: Review the conflict alert details
steps.expectedResult: Alert displays detailed information including: employee name, existing shift time (Tuesday 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM), new conflicting shift time (Tuesday 2:00 PM - 10:00 PM), and overlap period (2:00 PM - 4:00 PM)

steps.action: Verify that the alert provides clear guidance on resolving the conflict
steps.expectedResult: Alert includes suggestions such as adjusting shift times or selecting a different time slot

steps.action: Click 'Dismiss' or 'Close' button on the conflict alert
steps.expectedResult: Alert closes and returns user to the schedule assignment form without saving the conflicting shift

steps.action: Adjust the schedule to resolve the conflict by changing the shift time to non-overlapping hours (e.g., Tuesday 5:00 PM - 10:00 PM)
steps.expectedResult: Shift details are updated in the form and no conflict alert appears

steps.action: Click 'Save' button to save the adjusted schedule
steps.expectedResult: Schedule is saved successfully with confirmation message and both shifts appear on the calendar without conflicts

postconditions: Conflict alert has been dismissed
Adjusted schedule is saved without conflicts
Employee has two non-overlapping shifts on Tuesday

storyTitle: As Scheduler, I want to generate reports on employee schedules to analyze workforce allocation

testCases.title: Validate generation of schedule report with filters
preconditions: User is logged in with Scheduler or Manager role
Multiple employee schedules exist in the system for different date ranges
At least 10 schedule records are available for testing
User has permission to access the reporting module

steps.action: Navigate to the reporting module from the main menu or dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Reporting module page loads successfully displaying report selection UI with available report types

steps.action: Select 'Employee Schedule Report' from the report type dropdown or menu
steps.expectedResult: Employee Schedule Report option is selected and filter criteria section is displayed

steps.action: Select a date range filter (e.g., Start Date: 01/01/2024, End Date: 01/31/2024)
steps.expectedResult: Date range is applied and displayed in the filter section

steps.action: Select an employee filter from the employee dropdown (e.g., select specific employee or department)
steps.expectedResult: Employee filter is applied and displayed in the active filters section

steps.action: Verify that additional filter options are available (e.g., shift type, location)
steps.expectedResult: Additional filter options are visible and selectable

steps.action: Click 'Generate Report' button
steps.expectedResult: System processes the request and displays a loading indicator

steps.action: Wait for report generation to complete
steps.expectedResult: Report is generated and displayed within 5 seconds showing schedule data matching the selected filters

steps.action: Verify that the report contains correct data including employee names, shift times, dates, and shift types
steps.expectedResult: Report displays accurate data matching the applied filters with all relevant columns populated

steps.action: Verify that the report includes both summary and detailed views
steps.expectedResult: Report shows summary statistics at the top and detailed schedule entries below

postconditions: Schedule report is successfully generated and displayed
Report data matches the selected filter criteria
Report is ready for export or further analysis

testCases.title: Verify export of report in PDF and Excel formats
preconditions: User is logged in with Scheduler or Manager role
User has successfully generated a schedule report
Report is currently displayed on screen
User has permission to export reports
Browser allows file downloads

steps.action: Navigate to the reporting module and generate a schedule report with any valid filter criteria
steps.expectedResult: Schedule report is generated and displayed successfully with export options visible

steps.action: Locate the export options section (typically toolbar or action buttons)
steps.expectedResult: Export options are visible showing PDF and Excel format buttons or dropdown

steps.action: Click 'Export as PDF' button
steps.expectedResult: System initiates PDF generation and browser download dialog appears or file downloads automatically

steps.action: Open the downloaded PDF file using a PDF reader
steps.expectedResult: PDF file opens successfully, displays the report with correct formatting, all data is visible and readable, headers and footers are properly formatted

steps.action: Verify that the PDF contains all report data including summary and detailed views
steps.expectedResult: PDF contains complete report data matching the on-screen report with proper pagination

steps.action: Return to the report display page and click 'Export as Excel' button
steps.expectedResult: System initiates Excel generation and browser download dialog appears or file downloads automatically

steps.action: Open the downloaded Excel file using Microsoft Excel or compatible spreadsheet application
steps.expectedResult: Excel file opens successfully with data properly formatted in cells and columns

steps.action: Verify that the Excel file contains all report data with proper column headers and data types
steps.expectedResult: Excel file contains complete report data with headers in the first row, dates formatted correctly, and all columns are properly sized and readable

steps.action: Verify that data in Excel is editable and can be used for further analysis
steps.expectedResult: Excel data is editable, formulas can be applied, and data can be sorted and filtered

postconditions: PDF report file is successfully downloaded and viewable
Excel report file is successfully downloaded and viewable
Both exported files contain accurate and complete report data
Files are saved in the user's download directory

testCases.title: Validate scheduling of automated reports
preconditions: User is logged in with Scheduler or Manager role
User has permission to schedule automated reports
Email or notification system is configured
At least one employee schedule exists in the system
System time is correctly configured

steps.action: Navigate to the reporting module
steps.expectedResult: Reporting module page loads successfully

steps.action: Click on 'Schedule Automated Report' or 'Schedule Report' button
steps.expectedResult: Automated report scheduling interface is displayed with configuration options

steps.action: Select 'Employee Schedule Report' as the report type
steps.expectedResult: Report type is selected and additional configuration fields appear

steps.action: Configure report criteria including date range (e.g., 'Last 7 days'), employee filter (e.g., 'All employees'), and format (e.g., 'PDF')
steps.expectedResult: All criteria are selected and displayed in the configuration form

steps.action: Set the schedule frequency (e.g., 'Daily', 'Weekly', or specific time)
steps.expectedResult: Schedule frequency is selected and time picker is displayed

steps.action: Set the schedule time to a near-future time for testing (e.g., 2 minutes from current time)
steps.expectedResult: Schedule time is set and displayed in the form

steps.action: Configure delivery method (e.g., email address or system notification)
steps.expectedResult: Delivery method is configured and recipient information is entered

steps.action: Click 'Save Schedule' or 'Create Scheduled Report' button
steps.expectedResult: System validates the configuration and displays confirmation message that the scheduled report is saved

steps.action: Verify that the scheduled report appears in the list of scheduled reports with correct details
steps.expectedResult: Scheduled report is listed showing report type, criteria, frequency, next run time, and delivery method

steps.action: Wait for the scheduled time to arrive (monitor for the configured time)
steps.expectedResult: System automatically triggers report generation at the scheduled time

steps.action: Check the configured delivery location (email inbox or notification center)
steps.expectedResult: Report is generated automatically and delivered to the specified location

steps.action: Verify report delivery or availability by opening the report
steps.expectedResult: Report is accessible, contains correct data based on the configured criteria, and is in the specified format (PDF)

steps.action: Navigate back to scheduled reports list and verify the 'Last Run' timestamp is updated
steps.expectedResult: Scheduled report entry shows updated 'Last Run' timestamp and 'Next Run' time is calculated for the next occurrence

postconditions: Automated report schedule is successfully created and saved
Report is generated automatically at the scheduled time
Report is delivered or made available as configured
Scheduled report remains active for future executions
